title: Bikepacking 1,300km on the Great Divide & BC Trail | Part 2
content:
We posted part one of this video series a week or so ago and here’s part two!

Three friends bikepack 1,300 km over 3 weeks through BC and Alberta on the Great Divide Mountain Bike Route (GDMBR) and BC Trail in snow and record-breaking heatwave. Follow @Sir.Bikes.Alot on Instagram for more!

The post Bikepacking 1,300km on the Great Divide & BC Trail | Part 2 appeared first on The Radavist.
author: prolly
